|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-B1300 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Convexa-B) |revision = v1.3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/19/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/GL.iNet_GL-B1300 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-B1300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4028;IPQ4028, 0VV, NK708848, K070800; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 717 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E4:95:6E |oui = E4:95:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 <!-- USB 2.0 (unpopulated) --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GL-B1300-e01 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/19/2018 |estreldate = 01/2018 |estprice = 89 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAFN26U08180 |asin = B079FJKZV8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview==
[[File:1300_intro.jpg|550px]]
"GL-B1300_V1.3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Features=== * CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @717MHz (Quad-core ARM Cortex-A7) * Wi-Fi: 400Mbps (2.4GHz) + 867Mbps (5GHz); Mesh Wi-Fi Network * Flash: 32MB (NOR), RAM: 256MB (DDR3) * Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB3.0; OS: OpenWrt/LEDE pre-installed
==Links of Interest== ===Official Supports=== *[https://www.gl-inet.com/b1300/ Product Page] *[https://store.gl-inet.com/products/gl-b1300-home-ac-router Official Shop] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official Forum]
